Author: InnerCookie
Text: They would give a fuck about you.  I know nothing about your situation but if your bf made you promise, then logic dictates he cares about you.  But that's not going to make you feel better of course.  Maybe tell him about how you are feeling or anyone close to you.  At least do that before taking a direct path to restriction.

Author: SayBone
Text: Hang in there. I'm sorry you're feeling so rough. I definitely know what that self-hatred is like. I know we're just faceless people on the internet, but we here on this sub care about you.  I'm not going to ask you to eat because I know it's not that easy, but please be kind to yourself in some way.
